Class Lua52

party.iroiro.luajava.AbstractLua
party.iroiro.luajava.lua52.Lua52
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, Lua, LuaThread
public class Lua52 extends AbstractLua
A thin wrapper around a Lua 5.2 Lua state
